verses.verse: But I determined <S%G2919><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> with myself, <S%G1683><s%> that I would not come <S%G2064><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to you in heaviness. <S%G3077><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> I make <S%G3076><s%> you sorry, <S%G3076><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is he then <S%G2532><s%> that makes <S%G2165><s%> me glad, <S%G2165><s%> but the same which is made <S%G3076><s%> sorry <S%G3076><s%> by me?

And I wrote <S%G1125><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> same <S%G846><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> lest, <S%G3363><s%> when I came, <S%G2064><s%> I should have <S%G2192><s%> sorrow <S%G3077><s%> from them of whom <S%G3739><s%> I ought <S%G1163><s%> to rejoice; <S%G5463><s%> having confidence <S%G3982><s%> in you all, <S%G3956><s%> that my joy <S%G5479><s%> is the joy of you all. <S%G3956><s%>

For out of much <S%G4183><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%> and anguish <S%G4928><s%> of heart <S%G2588><s%> I wrote <S%G1125><s%> to you with many <S%G4183><s%> tears; <S%G1144><s%> not that you should be grieved, <S%G3076><s%> but that you might know <S%G1097><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> more <S%G4056><s%> abundantly <S%G4056><s%> to you.

But if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> caused <S%G3076><s%> grief, <S%G3076><s%> he has not grieved <S%G3076><s%> me, but in part: <S%G3313><s%> that I may not overcharge <S%G1912><s%> you all. <S%G3956><s%>
Sufficient <S%G2425><s%> to such <S%G5108><s%> a man is this <S%G3778><s%> punishment, <S%G2009><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was inflicted of many. <S%G4119><s%>

So <S%G5620><s%> that contrariwise <S%G5121><s%> you ought rather <S%G3123><s%> to forgive <S%G5483><s%> him, and comfort <S%G3870><s%> him, lest <S%G3381><s%> perhaps <S%G3381><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a one should be swallowed <S%G2666><s%> up with overmuch <S%G4055><s%> sorrow. <S%G3077><s%>
Why <S%G1352><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you that you would confirm <S%G2964><s%> your love <S%G26><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> him.

For to this <S%G5124><s%> end also <S%G2532><s%> did I write, <S%G1125><s%> that I might know <S%G1097><s%> the proof <S%G1382><s%> of you, whether <S%G1487><s%> you be obedient <S%G5255><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things.

To whom <S%G3739><s%> you forgive <S%G5483><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing, I forgive <S%G5483><s%> also: <S%G2532><s%> for if <S%G1487><s%> I forgave <S%G5483><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> thing, to whom <S%G3739><s%> I forgave <S%G5483><s%> it, for your <S%G5209><s%> sakes forgave I it in the person <S%G4383><s%> of Christ; <S%G5547><s%>
Lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> should get <S%G4122><s%> an advantage <S%G4122><s%> of us: for we are not ignorant <S%G50><s%> of his devices. <S%G3540><s%>

Furthermore, <S%G1161><s%> when I came <S%G2064><s%> to Troas <S%G5174><s%> to preach Christ's <S%G5547><s%> gospel, <S%G2098><s%> and a door <S%G2374><s%> was opened <S%G455><s%> to me of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%>

I had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> rest <S%G425><s%> in my spirit, <S%G4151><s%> because I found <S%G2147><s%> not Titus <S%G5103><s%> my brother: <S%G80><s%> but taking my leave <S%G657><s%> of them, I went <S%G1831><s%> from there into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia. <S%G3109><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> thanks <S%G5485><s%> be to God, <S%G2316><s%> which always <S%G3842><s%> causes <S%G2358><s%> us to triumph <S%G2358><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and makes <S%G5319><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> the aroma <S%G3744><s%> of his knowledge <S%G1108><s%> by us in every <S%G3956><s%> place. <S%G5117><s%>
For we are to God <S%G2316><s%> a sweet <S%G2175><s%> smell <S%G2175><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> in them that are saved, <S%G4982><s%> and in them that perish: <S%G622><s%>

To the one <S%G3303><s%> we are the smell <S%G3744><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> to death; <S%G2288><s%> and to the other <S%G3739><s%> the smell <S%G3744><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> to life. <S%G2222><s%> And who <S%G5101><s%> is sufficient <S%G2425><s%> for these <S%G5023><s%> things?

For we are not as many, <S%G4183><s%> which corrupt <S%G2585><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> but as of sincerity, <S%G1505><s%> but as of God, <S%G2316><s%> in the sight <S%G2714><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> we in Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
